rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {04, 05, 06, 06G, 07, 07G, 07PG, 11, 42, 50PG, 76, 78}

description: Topics include the purpose of research and its place in social work; research ethics including intellectual property issues; research designs including qualitative, quantitative, exploratory and experimental methods; developing research questions and hypotheses; sampling and data analysis including statistical analysis and writing research reports.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
